content.text: I'm going to make a batch of organic cat food for my kitty! What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to read fiction books. I'm a big fan of fantasy and sci-fi.
Me too! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I'd say The Lord of the Rings is probably my favorite.
That's a great choice! I loved The Lord of the Rings when I was a kid. I've read it several times.
I've read it at least a dozen times myself. It's such a good story.
What other books do you like?
I'm also a fan of the Harry Potter series, and I love the works of Terry Pratchett.
I've read a few Harry Potter books, but I haven't read anything by Terry Pratchett yet.
You should! His books are hilarious.
I'll check them out. Thanks for the recommendation.
